sentences.sContent: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.sCn: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.sContent: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.sCn: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.sContent: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.sCn: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.sContent: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.sCn: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.sContent: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.sCn: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

phrases.pCn: n. 商业秘密；行业秘密
特务机关；联邦经济情报局

words.tran: 秘密的；偷偷摸摸的；促进分泌的

trans.tranOther: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others
